name: The Scorpions Insurgency
startIntroPart1: 'The insurgency will always prevail.' - Trevor W. William
startIntroPart2: This is based on my original creation, so this is only just for fun.
declaringWar: Our goal is to conquer the world and destroy those who get in our way. And you are one of them. So prepare yourself, prepare yourself for the destruction of you and your nation!
attacked: You fool, do you really think you can defeat us? Fine then, we will raze you and your nation to the ground!
defeated: You may have won this war. But soon, the Scorpions Insurgency will rise again, and you will witness your nation burn to ashes.
introduction: I am Trevor William, I lead the fearsome Scorpions Insurgency. Now... I would have destroy you by now, but I will spare you, for now...
neutralLetsHearIt: Go on, I don't have all day.
neutralNo: Don't make a fool out of yourself.
afterPeace: Fine... I suppose you deserve a second chance.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, so accept it before I change my mind.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [50]% chance>
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [-30]
